parameters.name: EndTimestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp that specifies the end of the time range to query.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the GTM instance whose logs you want to query.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword for searching logs, in case-insensitive "%Keyword%" format.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language used by the user.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: StartTimestamp
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query.
